name: sordidness
content:
sordidness noun [U]
(DIRT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being dirty and unpleasant: He vividly describes the sordidness of middle-class poverty. the sordidness of factory smoke and hovels
More examplesFewer examplesThey looked up and down the river, with its amazing mixture of beauty and almost incredible sordidness."We must have at least one good servant, or the daily sordidness would make you miserable," he said.The plans were a response to the dank, crowded sordidness of the Victorian slum.
